mapper.sql: DNLD_HST_ID /*다운로드이력코드 */ , MENU_ID /*메뉴코드 */ , DNLD_NM /*다운로드명 */ , REGR_ID /*등록자ID */ , REG_DT /*등록일시 */ , AMDR_ID /*수정자ID */ , AMD_DT /*수정일시 */
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_SYS_XLS_DNLD_HST A LEFT JOIN TB_SYS_MENU_BAS B ON A.MENU_ID = B.MENU_ID

SELECT A.DNLD_HST_ID /*다운로드이력코드 */ , A.MENU_ID /*메뉴코드 */ , A.DNLD_NM /*다운로드명 */ , A.REGR_ID /*등록자ID */ , A.REG_DT /*등록일시 */ , A.AMDR_ID /*수정자ID */ , A.AMD_DT /*수정일시 */ , B.MENU_NM , ( SELECT LISTAGG(MENU_NM, '>') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY MENU_LVL_NO) FROM TB_SYS_MENU_BAS WHERE 1=1 START WITH MENU_ID = A.MENU_ID CONNECT BY PRIOR PRNTS_MENU_ID = MENU_ID ) MENU_PATH FROM TB_SYS_XLS_DNLD_HST A LEFT JOIN TB_SYS_MENU_BAS B ON A.MENU_ID = B.MENU_ID
ORDER BY REG_DT DESC
